name: Uncurable
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Michael Morbius → remove Uncurable from the game.
Remove 3 blood counters from Bloodlust. You cannot change form until your next turn ends. Discard this obligation.

name: Blood Hunt
text: To reverse his transformation, Morbius wants Spider-man's blood. When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each identity. Forced Response: After a friendly character is defeated by an enemy attack, place 2 threat on the main scheme. [hazard]

name: Spider-Man 616
text: Guard. Villainous. [star] Forced Response: After Spider-Man 616 activates against you, place 1 threat on each scheme. (Morbius's nemesis minion.) [star] Boost: You are confused.

name: All Webbed Up
text: Attach to your identity. Attached character gets -1 THW, -1 ATK, and -1 DEF. Hero Action: Take 1 damage and spend [energy][physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Blood Feud
text: Peril. (While you are resolving this card, other players cannot help you.) When Revealed: Choose: • Discard an ally or support you control. If you cannot, this card gains surge. • The villain attacks you.

name: This Bites
text: When Revealed: Give the villain a tough status card, take 1 damage and place 1 threat on the main scheme. "Morbius, Please..Let me help you...Before it's too late." —Spider-Man
